1370: Machtilden was born in Nieu straet in 1370.
Got married to Gheram at age 17 in 1370.
Gave birth to Iordanus in 1370 at age 17.
1371: Gave birth to Lutgeri in 1371 at age 18.
1372: Gave birth to Ghodekin in 1372 at age 19.
1375: Gave birth to Lubertus in 1375 at age 22.
1376: Gave birth to Sollen in 1376 at age 23.
1381: Gave birth to Esa in 1381 at age 28.
1382: Gave birth to Erenboede in 1382 at age 29.
1386: Gave birth to Salome in 1386 at age 33.
1390: Lost son Erenboede when Erenboede was 9 years old.
1391: Gave birth to Woubbrecht in 1391 at age 38.
